ship.name: White Horse of the Sleeping Forest

keyMoments.title: Cavendish's Appearance at Corrida Colosseum
keyMoments.description: The captain of the Beautiful Pirates makes his appearance at the tournament, representing his crew's interest in the Mera Mera no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Beautiful Pirates as a significant crew with a captain holding a 330,000,000 berry bounty.

keyMoments.title: Jesus Burgess Wins Block A
keyMoments.description: Jesus Burgess dominates Block A of the Corrida Colosseum tournament, revealing the Blackbeard Pirates' post-timeskip strength and their interest in obtaining the Mera Mera no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: First major post-timeskip appearance of a Blackbeard Pirates officer, demonstrating their increased power and strategic positioning in the New World.

keyMoments.title: Gambia's Appearance
keyMoments.description: Gambia, staff officer of the Barto Club, appears as a tournament competitor before being defeated by the undercover Marine Maynard.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the Barto Club through one of its officers, foreshadowing Bartolomeo's participation in the tournament.
